Text: To anyone who appreciates great acting and plot, this is very well worth watching -- the chemistry between Hopkins and Bancroft is unforgettable. Many thanks for making this available.

I can't thank you enough for this excellent movie.It's been a long time since some movie has touched me with its simplicity;this sure did.It also made me realize that we,in this electronic age have sadly forgotten......no,lost the art of writing letters.There was something so romantic,something personal,something so dear about hand written letters.Please keep on seeding this wonderful movie for others like me since you appear to be the only uploader.
A 10/10
V 10/10
